title: Generative AI on Vertex AI - Vertex AI generative AI notebook tutorials
abstract:
# Generative AI on Vertex AI - Vertex AI generative AI notebook tutorials
This document contains a list of notebook tutorials for Generative AI on Vertex AI. They're end-to-end tutorials that show you how to use some of the GenAI LLMs.
#
content:
## Featured tutorials## 
    Multimodal use cases with Gemini
    
Explore various use cases with multimodal with Gemini.  [Colab](https://colab.research.google.com/github/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai/blob/main/gemini/use-cases/intro_multimodal_use_cases.ipynb) | [GitHub](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai/blob/main/gemini/use-cases/intro_multimodal_use_cases.ipynb) ## 
    Deploy a Streamlit app to Cloud Run with Gemini Pro
    
Deploy a simple chatbot app using the Gemini Pro model and Streamlit to Cloud Run.  [GitHub](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai/blob/main/gemini/sample-apps/gemini-streamlit-cloudrun/) ## 
    Multimodal retrieval-augmented generation (RAG)
    
Perform RAG over multimodal data to do Q&A in a scientific paper that contains both text and images. [Colab](https://colab.research.google.com/github/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai/blob/main/gemini/use-cases/retrieval-augmented-generation/intro_multimodal_rag.ipynb) | [GitHub](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai/blob/main/gemini/use-cases/retrieval-augmented-generation/intro_multimodal_rag.ipynb) 
### List of tutorials
**Filter by:**
## What's next

- Explore more resources in the [Generative AI GitHub repo](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai)
